message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It is truly a valuable asset worth $1200000. Considering its worth, I am offering it to you for $1100000. This is a special opportunity to own something extraordinary at an attractive price. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to stay within a budget of $1050000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your budget constraints, I must maintain the value of our product. I am unable to accept $1050000 for the product. My next offer is $1150000. This still represents a significant discount for such a valuable item. I hope this proposal is more in line with your expectations.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. However, I am still aiming to keep the cost within my budget. Would you consider $1100000 for the product?

I see that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to negotiate further. My next offer is $1125000 for the product. This still maintains a good value for both parties involved. I hope this proposal is more acceptable to you.
Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1110000 for the product.

I understand your position, Bob. I am committed to finding a solution that works for both of us. My next offer is $1132500 for the product. This is a fair compromise that respects the value of the product while considering your budget constraints.
I appreciate your continued effort to find a mutually beneficial solution, Alice. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1125000 for the product.

I am glad we are making progress, Bob. My understanding is that you are looking to stay within your budget. In light of this, I am proposing a final offer of $1137500 for the product. This is a reasonable compromise that respects the value of the product while being mindful of your financial situation.
Thank you for your last offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to make a final counteroffer of $1130000 for the product.
